title: Helldivers 2 Is So Popular Players Are Squatting Servers
description: I admit it: I'm logging in at 9am to just to secure a spot for later in the evening.

title: Fake Funeral Live Stream Scams Are All Over Facebook
description: Scammers are copying genuine funeral service announcements, making their own Facebook accounts, then directing vulnerable victims to a fake livestream page. “It causes panic on the day where you shouldn't be thinking of that,” one impacted person said.
